root.name: Super Robot Wars Alpha 3
root.description: Original Characters Touma Kanou The main character of the male super robot route. He works as a delivery boy as his part-time job. During an attack by Balmarian forces, he was forced to pilot the experimental super robot RaiOh, which is equipped with the system LIOH, to prevent the destruction of the city. An inexperienced pilot but he has a strong sense of justice. Under the tutelage of Guy Shishio and Tetsuya Tsurugi, he joins the Alpha Numbers and undergoes training to become a better super robot pilot. He would later form a strong rivalry against Balmarian pilot, Baran Doban and his Bemidoban. On one of their encounters, RaiOh is heavily damaged as a result it would be upgraded to the DaiRaiOh. Theme Song: Toushi, Hatenaku (RaiOh) Shippuu Jinrai (DaiRaiOh) Kusuha Mizuha as seen in Alpha 3 Kusuha returns as a the main female character of the super robot route. This time her initial starting robot is the Gouryu Kai. Theme Song: Ano Aoi Sora e (Gouryu Kai) Ryuko Tenshou ~ Warera ni Teki Nashi (Shin Ryukoou) Featured Series A list of the anime series which are featured in the game. Series that premiered in the Super Robot Wars series in this game are marked with "(new)". Mobile Suit Gundam 0083: Stardust Memory Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam Mobile Suit Gundam ZZ Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack New Mobile Report Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz Mobile Suit Gundam SEED (new)Mazinger Z Great Mazinger Mazinkaiser (Banpresto Original version)Neon Genesis EvangelionThe End of EvangelionKing of Braves GaoGaiGarKing of Braves GaoGaiGar FINAL (new)Aim for the Top!
